documentation.author: Terry Wright
documentation.purpose:
If the result for Indwelling Catheter Activity Type is “Insertion” or the result for “Present On Admission” is “Indwelling urinary catheter” and the patient is an Inpatient, Observation, Ambulatory or Emergency over 18 years old the “Perform Indwelling Catheter Removal” order will be placed and the “Indwelling Catheter Removal Adult” powerplan will be suggested.
If there is a NBY patient and an existing "Reason Urinary Catheter Not Removed" order the "Perform Indwelling Catheter Removal" will not be ordered and the "Indwelling Catheter Removal Adult" powerplan will not be suggested.
If there is an existing "Perform Indwelling Catheter Removal" order another will not be ordered. If there is an existing "Indwelling Catheter Removal Adult" powerplan another will not be suggested.
documentation.explanation:
Rule triggers from clinical documentation of: 1) "Urinary Catheter Activity Type" = Insertion OR Insert - No longer a valid event code (Steve Wade) 2) "Indwelling Catheter Activity Type" = Insertion 3) "Present on Admission" = Indelling urinary catheter
There are two action groups that place the order depending on location.
documentation.query: 10/07/2014 - Selena, Linda and Toni change the rule to added Encounter Type - Ambulatory. 03/15/2016 - Steve Wade fixed broken powerplan links for "Indwelling Catheter Removal Adult" in L7 and A4. 04/13/2016 - Steve Wade modified to include L6 and L7 (restrictions for NBY only).

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_EVAL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PLAN_SUGGESTED_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Suggested plans POWERPLAN exist with status of OPT_STATUS and source tag OPT_SOURCE_TAG OPT_TIME_QUAL OPT_TIME_VALUE OPT_TIME_UNIT from current date/time for person OPT_LINK.
templateDefinitions.description: Suggested plans POWERPLAN exist with status of OPT_STATUS and source tag OPT_SOURCE_TAG OPT_TIME_QUAL OPT_TIME_VALUE OPT_TIME_UNIT from current date/time for person OPT_LINK.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SETUP_ADD_ORDERS_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Setup GROUP_NAME to add ORDERS with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT for OPT_SCOPE as OPT_LINK
templateDefinitions.description: Prepare orderables to be sent to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_DETAIL_DT_A
templateDefinitions.definition: SET_ACTION ORDER_DETAIL equal to OPT_ANCHOR_DT or inherit it from OPT_LINK, offset OPT_OFFSET_DAY days, OPT_OFFSET_HOUR hours and OPT_OFFSET_MIN minutes for orders setup in group(s) GROUP_NAME

column.value: Add details' value if it's not already
Empty detail's value (for NEW order only)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_DETAIL_A
templateDefinitions.definition: SET_ACTION ORDER_DETAIL equal to OPT_VALUE or inherit it from OPT_LINK for orders setup by GROUP_NAME

column.value: Add details' value if it's not already set
Empty detail's value (for NEW order only)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SUGGEST_PLAN_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Add POWERPLAN for person LINK with OPT_COMMENTS and OPT_SOURCE_TAG.
templateDefinitions.description: Add POWERPLAN for person LINK with OPT_COMMENTS and OPT_SOURCE_TAG.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALL_ORDER_SERVER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Call order server with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Send orders and actions from prior templates to the Order Server

values.value: Perform Indwelling Catheter Removal Adult Protocol
Perform Indwelling Catheter Removal Adult Protocol
Initiate Indwelling Catheter Removal Adult Protocol
